document_data.name: Atkiss Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Atkiss Alley''' was a minor avenue, partially of cobblestone and partially of hard-packed earth and [[gravel]], in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This curving road ran from north to south, connecting [[Quaff Alley]] with [[Virgin's Square]], while crossing through [[Scroll Street]]. As it crossed through Scroll Street and terminated at Virgin's Square, the road transition from gravel to cobblestone.
document_data.Reputation: This alley was often used by the well dressed men of the upper class and frequently patrolled by the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]], the latter of which largely dissuaded cutpurses from lurking in the alley.
